LanguageData.PlutoSerumHigh.label: pluto serum high
LanguageData.PlutoSerumHigh.description: Injected pluto serum. It has a strong effect on the body, causing extreme alertness, vastly improved sight, and extremely fast movement speed.
LanguageData.PlutoSerumAddiction.label: pluto serum addiction
LanguageData.PlutoSerumAddiction.description: A chemical addiction to pluto serum. Pluto serum, which has many side effects including fatigue, blurry vision, and psychotic wanderings among others, is generally prohibited for use in Bori society. It can be used in extenuating circumstances, but the user needs to specify the reason for use and the amount to be used.
LanguageData.PlutoSerumAddiction.stages.1.label: withdrawal
LanguageData.PlutoSerumTolerance.label: pluto serum tolerance
LanguageData.PlutoSerumTolerance.description: A built-up tolerance to pluto serum. The more severe this tolerance is, the more pluto serum it takes to get the same effect.
LanguageData.PlutoSerumTolerance.stages.small.label: small
LanguageData.PlutoSerumTolerance.stages.large.label: large
LanguageData.PlutoSerumTolerance.stages.massive.label: massive
